name: Team Rise
description:
Team Rise is a free game that lets you discover the joys of a challenging multiplayer game.
You can attempt to overcome the various difficulties with others, or alone.
Be prepared to fall down a lot and go crazy!

Share with your friends your climbing records, your achievements, the secrets you've found and explore all the maps with them!
If you fall a lot, don't give up and get your friends to help you.
Team Rise offers several maps to test your player control skills.
You'll also have several movement modes to help you finish the maps in single-player, but in multiplayer, you'll have the most complex movement mode so that you're all on an equal footing, don't hesitate to finish the maps with the hardest difficulty level.
